oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Odr탑iva poljoprivreda- preduvjet odr탑ivog razvitka
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Znaor, Darko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Farm economics
Farming Systems
Social aspects
Food systems
Policy environments and social economy
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper discuses the role and place of sustainable types of agriculture in the concept and implementation of sustainable development concept. It outlines key environmental, economic and social problems associated with high-input farming. It advocates conversion to ecological types of farming and its benefits.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Znaor, Darko (1996) Odr탑iva poljoprivreda- preduvjet odr탑ivog razvitka. [Sustainable agriculture - prerequisite for sustainable development.] Ekonomija/Econonics, 2 (2), pp. 361-362.
